source="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-2" target="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-2" value="<b>Top-Claim:<br></b>Salt <span style="" data-end="2059" data-start="2016">prevents malicious state-file injection</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="345" y="30" width="125" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-3" value="<b>Context: CT1</b><br>Salt relies on GitFS and remote repositories for state deployment." style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;arcSize=30;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="500" y="10" width="120" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-9" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;curved=1;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" parent="1" source="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-5" target="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-8" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-5" value="<font style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><b style="">Rebuttal R1:</b>&nbsp;<br>Unless unverified or unreviewed state files are deployed.</font>" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;size=17;fillColor=#e3c800;strokeColor=#B09500;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="337.5" y="150" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-13" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;curved=1;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" parent="1" source="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-8" target="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-11" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-8" value="<b>Sub-Claim C2:</b><br>All state changes undergo formal peer review and policy checks." style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="340" y="250" width="135" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-11" value="<font style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><b>Rebuttal R3:</b>&nbsp;<br>Unless review or branch protections are bypassed.</font>" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;size=17;fillColor=#e3c800;strokeColor=#B09500;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="337.5" y="380" width="140" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-14" value="<b>Sub-Claim C5:<br></b>CI pipelines verify signed commits and tags prior to deployment." style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-100" y="530" width="140" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-23" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;curved=1;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;endArrow=block;endFill=1;" parent="1" job log showing `git verify-commit/verify-tag` and pinned SHA." style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-95" y="670" width="130" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-25" E2:</b><br>`/etc/salt/master` GitFS config with `verify_ssl: True` and `env_whitelist: [...]`." style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="85" y="670" width="130" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-22" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#CCCCCC;" parent="1" vertex="1"> E5:</b><div>GitHub audit log CSV/JSON export (push, rule-change events).</div>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="605" y="670" width="130" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="EpLoNu7SxfJ4iQwhgqlz-34" value="" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#CCCCCC;" parent="1" vertex="1"> deployment." style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="250" width="135" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6WomZQhXulCoskA8_ufL-2" value="<b>Sub-Claim C3:<br></b>Maintainer and repository activities are continuously audited." style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="520" y="250" width="135" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6WomZQhXulCoskA8_ufL-6" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6WomZQhXulCoskA8_ufL-9" value="<font style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><b>Rebuttal R4:</b> <br>Unless maintainer tokens or permissions are compromised.</font>" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;size=17;fillColor=#e3c800;strokeColor=#B09500;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="690" y="380" width="140" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6WomZQhXulCoskA8_ufL-10" value="<b><font style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">Rebuttal R2:&nbsp;</font></b><div><span style="background-color: transparent;"><font style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">Unless commit or tag signatures are missing or not verified.</font></span><p data-end="1222" data-start="1201"></p></div>" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="6WomZQhXulCoskA8_ufL-16" value="<b>Sub-Claim C7:<br></b>Branch protection + CODEOWNERS enforce multi-party approval." </mxCell> <mxCell id="6WomZQhXulCoskA8_ufL-38" value="<b>Sub-Claim C10:<br></b>Alerts fire on permission or branch-rule changes." style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 123px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 446px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Top-Claim:
Salt prevents malicious state-file injection

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 601px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Context: CT1
Salt relies on GitFS and remote repositories for state deployment.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 170px; margin-left: 439px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
Rebuttal R1:
Unless unverified or unreviewed state files are deployed.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 133px; height: 1px; padding-top: 285px; margin-left: 441px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Sub-Claim C2:
All state changes undergo formal peer review and policy checks.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 439px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
Rebuttal R3:
Unless review or branch protections are bypassed.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 560px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Sub-Claim C5:
CI pipelines verify signed commits and tags prior to deployment.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 725px; margin-left: 6px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Evidence E1:
CI job log showing `git verify-commit/verify-tag` and pinned SHA.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 725px; margin-left: 186px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Evidence E2:
`/etc/salt/master` GitFS config with `verify_ssl: True` and `env_whitelist: [...]`.

ellipse.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 133px; height: 1px; padding-top: 285px; margin-left: 261px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Sub-Claim C1:
Salt enforces signed commit and tag verification before deployment.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 133px; height: 1px; padding-top: 285px; margin-left: 621px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Sub-Claim C3:
Maintainer and repository activities are continuously audited.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 791px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
Rebuttal R4:
Unless maintainer tokens or permissions are compromised.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 91px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

span.font: Unless commit or tag signatures are missing or not verified.

div.div:
Sub-Claim C7:
Branch protection + CODEOWNERS enforce multi-party approval.

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 560px; margin-left: 701px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Sub-Claim C9:
Maintainer actions are captured in repository/org audit logs.

div.div:
Evidence E3:
GitHub branch-protection export/screenshot and `CODEOWNERS`.

Evidence E4:
CI policy report / workflow YAML (required status checks, secret scan, lint).

CSalt master enforces GitFS SSL verification and environment allowlisting.

div.div: Security alert report confirming detection of branch-rule or permission changes.

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 170px; margin-left: 666px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: Inference Rule IR1: If Salt integrates with a trusted repository or HTTPS/SSL

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 280px; margin-left: 821px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font: Undercut UC1: Unless Salt isn't integrated with a trusted Repostiroy

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 138px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 1001px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Sub-Claim C6:
Salt enforces trusted repository integration via HTTPS/SSH and verified host keys.

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
